description: It helps you focus your communication efforts in one place.
Makes installing tens of apps useless by just installing this and linking it with all of your social media accounts. Recommend for everyone!
functionality is just great, but when you have about 10 services in use it starts to consume RAM, about 3GB.
summary: great app, but embedded web is not so great

description: I managed to set up services with no problems, but don't receive chat updates or notifications which makes it effectively useless for me.
summary: The idea is cool... but it wouldn't update

description: Rambox is better and open source. I had issues constantly.
Here is a fork without ads.. https://getferdi.com/
summary: It was pretty good until the ads started appearing

description: can't recommend
summary: Good app but too demanding on cpu/ badly optimised

description: messenger audio and video call doesn't work
summary: messenger audio and video call doesn't work

description: cant link any accounts

Constantly crashing when trying to open, has issues when using multiple screens and if you alt-tab away and back it can magically get stuck between 2 screens. Not worth the money (I didn't pay), as a free version worth a try to see if its buggy on your system. But the whole thing can be replaced with properly setup browser tabs.

This is crippleware. There is a 15 second wait at random times, not just at startup unless you pay about $4/month minimum. Unusable unless you pay, and it's really just a web version of all the different chats inside one web browser, each in its own tab. Chrome will let you do something similar natively for free.
Nice application except for the timer which is very annoying, understandable that the developers want to make a bug, but the timer should be only on start-up or something less frequent.
summary: Would not recommend with the current timer, switched to Ferdi

description: The Snap package is no longer being updated, need to download from the website.
summary: nice to manage multiple chat app, snap is deprecated

description:
Useful, this is a great app.

Only one bad point, its consume a lot of CPU...
summary: Thank you for this awesome service

description: It's my preferred app to have many messenger apps in one app
summary: A great app to have many messengers in one app

description: So glad that a fellow coworker recommended this to me. I was looking for a client that was separate from using the browser for most of Gmail's apps. Thank you Franz! Everything works great and after I am done testing this, I may end up paying for a subscription!
If you can come to terms with the resource requirements of Franz, you should try out Ferdi, which is the community edition, providing many premium features for free.
Ferdi is a Franz Fork, however he has better features and no paid version
Works as design
Franz does much the same as any of the whatsapp containers but hogs CPU and nags about commercial upgrades. Use one of the other ones.
really bad do not use

For some countries with different currency is almost impossible to pay for the current plans.

Is a good application, not good enough for the price.

I'll give a try to Rambox
Always logs out and makes you wait. Unusable.
Needs more work
same as ferdi but the latter is free
Wage revenge for the assasination of the emperor's niece is truly wholesome. Unironically, the app has a good and solid idea.
Functionality seems good but the 15 seconds to wait for the screen to update unless you have paid is not great. I would rather it had more accounts for the subscription rather than this nag.
summary: Needs a subscription or else gets annoying

description: I enjoy it! Sure, sometimes takes its sweet time loading (it's basically just browser-windows with notifications). RECOMMEND!
summary: One app to message them all!

description: makes me login everytime i open it
Franz ist ohne Zweifel ein gutes Programm, aber der 10 Sekunden Timer für die kostenlose Version schränkt die Bedienung deutlich ein.
Freie Version ist echt nicht zu empfehlen. Idiotischer Timer am Anfang
Funktioniert einwandfrei und um einiges schneller als die AppImage. Top!

Funktioniert Leidlich.
Leider nur ein Wrapper nicht wie Vermutet werden kann eine echte Konsolidierung der Kontakte. Dann doch weiterhin PidGin mit all den Plugins

He probado varias, pero siempre vuelvo a Franz. Le falta un buen editor para añadir servicios, pero yo lo hago editando las recetas y así puedo tener, por ejemplo, Twitter Lite. La 5 estrella la tendría si fuera más fácil añadir esos nuevos servicios, lo que podría permitir que las notificaciones llegaran.
summary: Es mi app preferida para web-apps

description: Me gusta aunque le hace falta la integración a VK que sí tiene en windows pero por alguna razón aquí en Linux no.

Está bien para cotejar todas las apps de chat en un sólo lugar, pero el servicio de Páginas de Facebook no funciona, las llamadas en Skype no ofrecen la ventana flotante, ni siquiera se puede hacer llamadas en Google Hangouts, y los audios no es ecuchan en WhatsApp. He vuelto a usar Hangouts y WhatsApp en Chrome, además de la app oficial de Skype
estaría bueno poder aumentar tamaño de letras
inutile! Trop de temps perdu

Cette application est vraiment très pratique pour s'organiser et garder tous nos moyens de communication au même endroit.
À lancer avec la ligne ci-dessous pour le démarrer minimisé.

sh -c "/usr/bin/flatpak run --branch=stable --arch=x86_64 --command=franz --file-forwarding com.meetfranz.Franz @@u %U @@ & sleep 7; wmctrl -Fc Franz"
Что за бред почему при очередной загрузке окно входа загораживает банер с предложением установить гугло-хрень которую я крайне не желаю видеть на своем компе!
При запуске идет задержка со счетчиком секунд и сообщение: Хотите убрать - возьмите ПРО или платную лицензию, типа того.
summary: Реклама, очень агрессивно предлагают платную лицензию
